AuthorName.Title: Attacks, Predatory Trading, and Scams on Blockchain Systems
AuthorName.Content: B Weintraub - 2025;The search and design of economically viable cryptocurrencies goes back decades. The earliest reference to what we might recognize today as a cryptocurrency came in a 1983 publication. David Chaum's paper on using digital signatures for untraceable payments, which he called DigiCash allowed anonymous payments between two individuals using a trusted intermediary, like a bank (Chaum, 1983). The first payment over DigiCash happened on May 27, 1994 (2025). This first model of a …• Cites: ‪Precise static modeling of ethereum “memory”‬
